Specimen Type: Formalin-fixed, paraffin-embedded (FFPE) tumor tissue blocks or unstained slides
Purpose: To detect somatic mutations in the KRAS gene of tumor samples using PCR and sequencing methods.
Container: FFPE tissue block or unstained glass slide
Equipment: DNA extraction kit, thermocycler, gel electrophoresis apparatus, sequencing analyzer (e.g., Sanger or NGS)
